text: Rero mugihe bihebura kuriwe baciye bagenda kwiherera n’ukwongorerana, umukuru wabo aca avuga ati:- mbega ntimuzi yuko So wanyu yafashe indagano kuri mwebwe kandi kw’izina ry’Imana nakera mwaragize amakosa yanyu kundagano yanyu hejuru y’intumwa y’Imana Yussufu (iii) nanje sinzova muri iki gihugu kugeza aho Data wanje azompa uruhusha, canke Imana incire urubanza rw’ukuva ngaha kuko ariyo nziza z’abacamanza
